DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria ( symptomatic subject ) : To present least 3 follow finding : positive Neer impingement test , positive Hawkins impingement test , positive Jobe test , pain passive isometric resist shoulder lateral rotation , pain active shoulder elevation , pain palpation rotator cuff tendon , pain C5 C6 dermatome region . Exclusion Criteria ( symptomatic subject ) : sign `` red flag '' spinal manipulation ( eg , fracture , osteoporosis , malignancy , infection , active inflammatory process ) , pregnancy systemic illness receive physical therapy manual therapy treatment within 6 month prior evaluation sign complete rotator cuff tear acute inflammation cervicalthoracic spine relate symptom ( ie , positive cervical compression test excessive kyphosis ) scoliosis glenohumeral instability ( ie , positive apprehension , anterior drawer , sulcus test ) previous upper extremity fracture shoulder surgery . Exclusion Criteria ( asymptomatic subject ) : positive test shoulder impingement sign `` red flag '' spinal manipulation ( eg , fracture , osteoporosis , malignancy , infection , active inflammatory process ) , pregnancy systemic illness receive physical therapy manual therapy treatment within 6 month prior evaluation sign complete rotator cuff tear acute inflammation cervicalthoracic spine relate symptom ( ie , positive cervical compression test excessive kyphosis ) scoliosis glenohumeral instability ( ie , positive apprehension , anterior drawer , sulcus test ) previous upper extremity fracture shoulder surgery .
